name: Classic Margherita Pizza
instructions: 1) Prepare pizza dough. 2) Spread tomato sauce. 3) Add mozzarella and basil. 4) Bake until crust is golden.

name: Creamy Tomato Pasta
instructions: 1) Cook pasta. 2) Sauté garlic and tomatoes. 3) Add cream and parmesan. 4) Toss with pasta.

name: Garlic Herb Roasted Chicken
instructions: 1) Season chicken with herbs and garlic. 2) Roast in oven until cooked through.

name: Simple Beef Stir-Fry
instructions: 1) Stir-fry beef with vegetables. 2) Add soy sauce and ginger. 3) Serve over rice.

name: Salmon with Lemon and Dill
instructions: 1) Season salmon with salt, pepper, and dill. 2) Bake or pan-fry. 3) Squeeze lemon juice before serving.

name: Spicy Shrimp Tacos
instructions: 1) Marinate shrimp in chili powder and lime juice. 2) Grill or pan-fry shrimp. 3) Serve in tacos with toppings.

name: Lentil Soup
instructions: 1) Sauté vegetables. 2) Add lentils and broth. 3) Simmer until lentils are tender.

name: Chicken and Rice Casserole
instructions: 1) Combine cooked chicken, rice, and vegetables. 2) Mix with cream of mushroom soup. 3) Bake until bubbly.

name: Apple Crumble
instructions: 1) Prepare apple filling with cinnamon and sugar. 2) Make crumble topping with oats, flour, and butter. 3) Bake until golden brown.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: 1) Cream butter and sugar. 2) Add eggs and vanilla. 3) Mix in flour and chocolate chips. 4) Bake until edges are golden.

name: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: 1) Sauté onions and mushrooms in butter. 2) Add rice and toast lightly. 3) Gradually add warm broth, stirring constantly. 4) Finish with parmesan and herbs.

name: Beef and Bean Chili
instructions: 1) Brown ground beef with onions and peppers. 2) Add beans, tomatoes, and chili spices. 3) Simmer for at least 1 hour.

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
instructions: 1) Sauté vegetables. 2) Add chicken broth and chicken. 3) Simmer until chicken is cooked. 4) Add noodles and cook until tender.

name: Baked Potato with Sour Cream and Chives
instructions: 1) Bake potatoes until soft. 2) Top with sour cream, chives, and bacon bits.

name: French Onion Soup
instructions: 1) Caramelize onions in butter for a long time. 2) Add beef broth and thyme. 3) Simmer. 4) Serve with toasted bread and Gruyère cheese.

name: Caprese Salad
instructions: 1) Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. 2) Arrange on a plate with basil leaves. 3) Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.

name: Guacamole
instructions: 1) Mash avocados. 2) Mix with onions, tomatoes, lime juice, and cilantro. 3) Season with salt and pepper.

name: Greek Salad
instructions: 1) Chop vegetables. 2) Combine with feta cheese and olives. 3) Dress with olive oil and oregano.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: 1) Make Caesar dressing. 2) Toss romaine lettuce with dressing and croutons. 3) Top with parmesan cheese.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: 1) Grill or bake chicken breast. 2) Prepare Caesar salad as above. 3) Slice chicken and add to salad.

name: Tuna Salad Sandwich
instructions: 1) Mix tuna with mayonnaise, celery, and onion. 2) Season with salt and pepper. 3) Serve on bread.

name: Egg Salad Sandwich
instructions: 1) Boil and chop eggs. 2) Mix with mayonnaise, mustard, and celery. 3) Season with salt and pepper. 4) Serve on bread.

name: BLT Sandwich
instructions: 1) Cook bacon until crispy. 2) Assemble sandwich with bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: 1) Butter bread slices. 2) Place cheese between slices. 3) Grill until golden brown and cheese is melted.

name: Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwich
instructions: 1) Spread peanut butter on one slice of bread. 2) Spread jelly on the other slice. 3) Combine slices.

name: Chicken Fajitas
instructions: 1) Slice chicken and bell peppers. 2) Sauté with onions and fajita seasoning. 3) Serve with tortillas and toppings.

name: Vegetarian Chili
instructions: 1) Sauté vegetables. 2) Add beans, tomatoes, and chili spices. 3) Simmer for at least 45 minutes.

name: Shepherd's Pie
instructions: 1) Brown ground beef with vegetables. 2) Top with mashed potatoes. 3) Bake until golden brown.

name: Chicken Pot Pie
instructions: 1) Cook chicken and vegetables in creamy sauce. 2) Top with pie crust. 3) Bake until crust is golden.

name: Beef and Broccoli
instructions: 1) Stir-fry beef until browned. 2) Add broccoli and sauce. 3) Cook until broccoli is tender-crisp.

name: Sweet Potato Casserole
instructions: 1) Boil and mash sweet potatoes. 2) Mix with butter, brown sugar, and spices. 3) Top with pecan crumble. 4) Bake until heated through.

name: Mac and Cheese
instructions: 1) Cook macaroni pasta. 2) Make cheese sauce with milk, butter, and cheddar cheese. 3) Combine pasta and sauce. 4) Bake until bubbly.

name: Lasagna
instructions: 1) Brown ground beef with onions and garlic. 2) Layer lasagna noodles with meat sauce, ricotta, and mozzarella. 3) Bake until bubbly and golden.

name: Chicken Enchiladas
instructions: 1) Cook chicken and shred. 2) Fill tortillas with chicken and cheese. 3) Cover with enchilada sauce and cheese. 4) Bake until bubbly.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: 1) Brown ground beef with taco seasoning. 2) Serve in taco shells with toppings.

name: Fish and Chips
instructions: 1) Batter cod fillets. 2) Deep-fry fish and potatoes until golden brown and crispy.

name: Chicken and Waffles
instructions: 1) Prepare waffle batter. 2) Fry chicken until crispy. 3) Serve waffles with fried chicken and maple syrup.

name: Pancakes
instructions: 1) Mix pancake batter. 2) Cook pancakes on a griddle until golden brown.

name: Waffles
instructions: 1) Prepare waffle batter. 2) Cook waffles in a waffle iron until golden brown.

name: French Toast
instructions: 1) Dip bread slices in egg and milk mixture. 2) Fry until golden brown. 3) Serve with syrup or fruit.

name: Oatmeal
instructions: 1) Cook oats with milk or water. 2) Top with fruit, nuts, and honey.

name: Scrambled Eggs
instructions: 1) Whisk eggs with milk and seasonings. 2) Scramble in a pan until cooked.

name: Omelette
instructions: 1) Whisk eggs with milk. 2) Cook in a pan and add fillings like cheese, vegetables, or meat.

name: Frittata
instructions: 1) Sauté vegetables and/or meat. 2) Pour in whisked eggs. 3) Bake or cook on stovetop until set.

name: Quiche
instructions: 1) Prepare pie crust. 2) Fill with egg mixture and fillings like cheese, spinach, and bacon. 3) Bake until set and golden.

name: Breakfast Burrito
instructions: 1) Scramble eggs with fillings. 2) Warm tortillas. 3) Fill tortillas with eggs and toppings.

name: Breakfast Smoothie
instructions: 1) Blend fruits, yogurt, and milk until smooth.

name: Fruit Salad
instructions: 1) Chop fruits. 2) Combine in a bowl. 3) Optionally drizzle with honey or lemon juice.

name: Yogurt Parfait
instructions: 1) Layer yogurt with granola and fruit in a glass or bowl.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: 1) Toast bread. 2) Mash avocado and spread on toast. 3) Season with salt and pepper, optional toppings.

name: Chicken Curry
instructions: 1) Sauté onions and garlic. 2) Add chicken and curry powder. 3) Simmer in coconut milk until chicken is cooked.

name: Butter Chicken
instructions: 1) Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. 2) Cook in tomato-based butter sauce. 3) Serve with rice or naan.

name: Tikka Masala
instructions: 1) Marinate chicken or paneer. 2) Cook in creamy tomato-based masala sauce. 3) Serve with rice or naan.

name: Palak Paneer
instructions: 1) Sauté spinach and garlic. 2) Add paneer cheese and spices. 3) Simmer until flavors meld.

name: Vegetable Biryani
instructions: 1) Layer rice with vegetables and spices. 2) Steam until rice is cooked and flavors are blended.

name: Samosas
instructions: 1) Prepare dough for samosa crust. 2) Make potato and pea filling with spices. 3) Fry samosas until golden brown.

name: Naan Bread
instructions: 1) Prepare naan dough with yogurt and yeast. 2) Cook naan on a hot skillet or tandoor until puffed and slightly charred.

name: Raita
instructions: 1) Mix yogurt with cucumber, mint, and spices. 2) Chill before serving.

name: Chicken Pad Thai
instructions: 1) Soak rice noodles. 2) Stir-fry chicken, eggs, and vegetables. 3) Add Pad Thai sauce and peanuts. 4) Toss with noodles.

name: Vegetable Pad See Ew
instructions: 1) Soak wide rice noodles. 2) Stir-fry noodles with vegetables and soy sauce-based sauce.

name: Spring Rolls
instructions: 1) Prepare spring roll wrappers. 2) Fill with vegetables and shrimp or tofu. 3) Fry until golden brown or serve fresh.

name: Tom Yum Soup
instructions: 1) Prepare Tom Yum broth with lemongrass, galangal, and lime leaves. 2) Add shrimp, mushrooms, and tomatoes. 3) Simmer until shrimp is cooked.

name: Green Curry
instructions: 1) Sauté curry paste with coconut milk. 2) Add chicken or tofu and vegetables. 3) Simmer until vegetables are tender.

name: Red Curry
instructions: 1) Sauté curry paste with coconut milk. 2) Add beef or tofu and vegetables. 3) Simmer until vegetables are tender.

name: Massaman Curry
instructions: 1) Sauté curry paste with coconut milk. 2) Add beef or tofu, potatoes, and peanuts. 3) Simmer until potatoes are tender.

name: Yellow Curry
instructions: 1) Sauté curry paste with coconut milk. 2) Add chicken or tofu, potatoes, and carrots. 3) Simmer until vegetables are tender.

name: Panang Curry
instructions: 1) Sauté curry paste with coconut milk. 2) Add beef or tofu and bell peppers. 3) Simmer until peppers are tender.

name: Sushi Rolls
instructions: 1) Cook sushi rice. 2) Prepare fillings like salmon, avocado, and cucumber. 3) Roll sushi using nori sheets.

name: Nigiri Sushi
instructions: 1) Prepare sushi rice. 2) Slice fish fillets (salmon, tuna). 3) Shape rice into oblong mounds and top with fish.

name: Sashimi
instructions: 1) Slice fresh fish fillets (salmon, tuna). 2) Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and ginger.

name: Miso Soup
instructions: 1) Prepare dashi broth. 2) Dissolve miso paste in broth. 3) Add tofu and seaweed.

name: Edamame
instructions: 1) Boil edamame pods in salted water. 2) Serve warm with salt.

name: Gyoza (Potstickers)
instructions: 1) Prepare gyoza wrappers or use pre-made. 2) Fill with pork and vegetable mixture. 3) Pan-fry and steam gyoza.

name: Ramen
instructions: 1) Prepare ramen broth (pork or chicken-based). 2) Cook ramen noodles. 3) Assemble ramen bowls with broth, noodles, protein, and toppings.

name: Udon Noodle Soup
instructions: 1) Prepare udon broth (dashi or chicken-based). 2) Cook udon noodles. 3) Assemble udon bowls with broth, noodles, protein, and toppings.
